scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w team-mates-tests
scripts.holochain: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "npm run start -w team-mates-ui"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/happ/team-mates.happ --run=8888 -a team-mates network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:ui: npm run build -w team-mates-ui && cd ui/dist && bestzip ../ui.zip *
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack workdir/dna
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf ui/node_modules/ && rimraf test/node_modules
